casebody.data:
ADKINS
v.
NC DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. No. 53P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Darryl Adkins, Laurinburg, for Adkins, Darryl. *743Zachary Padget, Associate Attorney General, for NC Department of Public Safety.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of February 2016 by Plaintiff for Request for Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
